gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: NOAA NMFS SWFSC Environmental Research Division

gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata Part 2 Extensions for Imagery and Gridded Data

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Front Probability, GOES Imager, Western Hemisphere, 2001-present, EXPERIMENTAL (10 Day Composite), Lon+/-180

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The data indicates the probability of oceanic sea surface temperature fronts off the California coast. They were created using remote sensing sea surface temperature data from the GOES geostationary satellite. THIS IS AN EXPERIMENTAL PRODUCT: intended strictly for scientific evaluation by professional marine scientists. The data is unitless.

gmd:credit.gco:CharacterString: NOAA NESDIS COASTWATCH, NOAA SWFSC ERD

gmd:keyword.gco:CharacterString: Earth Science > Oceans > Ocean Circulation > Fronts
